named-query.name: Edgelist.deleteBySlug
named-query.query: DELETE FROM Edgelist e WHERE e.edgelistPK.graphslug = :graphTermInstanceSlug

named-query.name: Edgelist.getMaxSlug
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(SUBSTRING(e.edgelistPK.graphslug,1,5)) FROM Edgelist e WHERE e.edgelistPK.graphslug LIKE '%UPLD'

named-query.name: Edgelist.findByTermInstanceSlug
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Edgelist e where e.edgelistPK.graphslug = :graphTermInstanceSlug
